name: expo-dev-menu
description: Expo/React Native module with the developer menu.

scripts.bundle:dev:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.ios.js
scripts.bundle:prod:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.ios.js
scripts.bundle:dev:android: react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform android --dev true --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.android.js --assets-dest android/src/main/res
scripts.bundle:prod:android: react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform android --dev false --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.android.js --assets-dest android/src/main/res

author: 650 Industries, Inc.
